short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to capture and report bugs from your website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture.dev makes it easy to add visual feedback to any website that helps get your whole team on the same page quickly.

With the capture extension you can:

✅ Annotate your website to highlight important feedback quickly.
✅ Capture all of the details that developers need to fix bugs, with no technical knowledge required.
✅ Get an AI summary of technical logs to help understand and prioritise issues at a glance. 
✅ Get automatic reproduction steps for any bug, so you never need to write a manual bug report again.
✅  Use our built-in integrations with popular tools to integrate seamlessly into your existing workflow.
